Module tagtraum.audioplayer4j

Package com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j

Simple (non-visual) audio player.
Author:
Hendrik Schreiber
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AudioDevice
    Represents an installed audio device.
    AudioDevicesListener
    AudioDevice listener.
    AudioPlayer
    Audio player.
    AudioPlayerListener
    Listener for AudioPlayer events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioDevices
    Describes the audio devices installed on your system.
    AudioPlayerFactory
    AudioPlayer factory.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AudioPlayerException
    Runtime player exception.
